synopsis.text: Mikimoto, the renowned character designer of the 'Macross' series, graces the cover of Mitchie M's second album, 'Virtual Popstar.' The album, released on November 6th, 2019, features a captivating track centered around a thrilling pro wrestling match. The match stars Miku and Rin, known as the Cutie Angels, as they take on the formidable duo of Meiko and Luka. Adding to the excitement, KAITO provides ringside commentary, while Len ensures fair play as the referee. This song promises a unique blend of music and wrestling, making 'Virtual Popstar' a must-listen for fans of both genres.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
